entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assembly.GetTypes fails on System.DirectoryServices assembly #68240
  • Inconsistency in root .editorconfig with published coding style. #68238
  • Tar APIs pending feedback to address #68230
  • PushRange empty Array throws exception #68228
  • [API Proposal]: `IBinaryInteger<TSelf>.ReverseEndianess`. #68227
  • [API Proposal]: Add ReadOnlySequence overload for WriteRawValue #68223
  • [NativeAOT] Benchmarks using Vector<T> seems to be slow #68222
  • Strings.resx is embedded twice into the assembly for projects that set EnableDefaultItems to true #68218
    7.0.0
  • pin over SPMI has unexpectedly high variance #68214
  • [Ubuntu 22.04] libSystem.IO.Compression.Native.so contains an unresolvable reference to symbol log2: it's probably a plugin #68212
  • [API Proposal]: Math.MulHigh #68207
  • [Android] Some System.Net.Security tests are failing #68206
  • [API Proposal]: Add SSE4.2 String Comparison Intrinsics #68204
  • Test failure baseservices/TieredCompilation/TieredVtableMethodTests/TieredVtableMethodTests.sh #68197
  • [Wasm] Satellite assemblies loading failure #68192
  • Consider moving `IFloatingPointIeee754<T>.MaxNumber` down to `INumber<T>` #68191
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServices.WindowsServiceHelpers.IsWindowsService crashes when started as service #67093
  • Unmanaged crashes (heap corruption) on Windows 11 #68225
  • Add API IndexNotOf #28795
    7.0.0
  • [arm64] Perf_FileStream.FlushAsync benchmark hangs on Debian 11 #67545
  • EventLoggerFactoryExtensions seems to disregard filters #46064
    Future
  • OSR gets wrong offset for memory arg on arm64 OSX #68194
  • `double.TryParse` sometimes doesn't parse the dot #68200
  • RegexOptions.NonBacktracking needs to handle capture groups when startat == input.Length #65606
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'isValidGeneralDatasize(size)' during 'Generate code' #68170
  • FDD app uses DOTNET_ROOT even though it points to wrong architecture #68180
    Future
  • Test failure: System.Net.Security.Tests.CertificateValidationRemoteServer.DefaultConnect_EndToEnd_Ok(host: \"api.nuget.org\") #67686
  • .NET 6 not support XslCompiledTransform.Load(type(myXsltCompiled_dll)) #68129
  • Test failure: System.Net.Security.Tests.CertificateValidationRemoteServer.CertificateValidationRemoteServer_EndToEnd_Ok(useAsync: False) #67683
  • [API Proposal]: Implementations of marshallers using `CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute` #66623
    7.0.0
  • consider presenting IPv4-Mapped addresses as IPv4 #67952
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Encoding.UTF7 property access should be disabled by default #59319
  • System.Text.Json options throws an exception setting DefaultIgnoreCondition = Always #67740
  • mono minijit x64 test failure: loopinfinally_do.dll exception #68187
    7.0.0
  • Incorrect results of right shifting huge BigIntegers #65633
    7.0.0
  • CMP0068 CMake warning on mac #41084
    7.0.0
  • `Dns.GetHostAddressesAsync` gets stuck on Windows #63552
    6.0.x
  • FormatterServices.GetUninitializedObject no longer supports delegates #68144
  • Missing documentation for HttpRequestMessage.Properties #68150
  • SPMI failing in CI #68137
  • Debug.Assert failure in System.Reflection.FieldInfo.SetValue in Debug Mono builds #68029
    7.0.0
  • Build failure: "...nativeaot\Runtime\Full\AsmOffsets.cs' could not be found" #68205

PullRequests

Created

  • [MAUI][Blazor][PERF] Add APK file usage for Android Maui Blazor SOD #68241
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono] Rename .md files that are not actually markdown #68239
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove usage of *wprintf* family of functions #68237
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Update 'main' branding to release/7.0-preview5 #68236
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Preserve FirstChanceExceptionEventArgs ctor #68235
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add missing RUC annotation to IAsyncEnumerableConverterFactory #68233
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [draft][mono] merge wasm-threading-eventpipe into main #68232
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Added fixes for tests which are not robust against line endings #68231
    community-contribution
  • Build rolling release jits #68229
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use generic math to dedup Enumerable.Sum/Average #68226
    area-System.Linq, needs-author-action
  • Exclude all markdown files from triggering CI #68221
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Avoid duplicate Strings.resx import & code-cleanup #68220
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [zlib] Bump to upstream 1.2.12 #68219
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Exposing MaxMagnitudeNumber, MaxNumber, MinMagnitudeNumber, and MinNumber #68217
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Stop IHostedService instances asynchronously by default #68216
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Vectorized MemoryExtensions.CommonPrefixLength #68210
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Remove CallArgABIInfo::ArgNum and fill out function headers #68209
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix leaks after unsuccessful assembly load #68203
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • fix(wasm): Discriminate satellite assemblies loading based on culture #68195
    arch-wasm, community-contribution
  • Gather 'Tellurium' team issues in team project #68193
    area-Meta, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Add initial version of {Last}IndexOfAnyExcept #67941
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Treat SuperPMI failures in AzDO pipelines as pipeline failures #68196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix a race condition in the thread pool #68171
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Delete AssemblySpec::m_wszCodeBase #68186
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Reflection.Emit cleanups #67170
    area-System.Reflection
  • avoid allocating collection for intermediate certificates #68188
    area-System.Net.Security
  • JIT: fix patchpoint offset encoding #68202
  • Two-phase matching algorithm for NonBacktracking #68199
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • JIT: fix issue with invalid operand size in OSR prolog on arm64 #68198
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Managed implementation of NTLM for Android and tvOS #66879
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Expose ArrayMarshaller and PointerArrayMarshaller #68173
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Revert "Update dump template (#68185)" #68224
    area-Meta
  • Improving STJ source generator support for record types #68064
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Add JSON type hierarchies #67961
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Consistently use forward slashes in test exclusion lists #68215
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix CLR_CMAKE_USE_SYSTEM_LIBUNWIND on macOS #68116
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Add SIMD support for System.Numerics.Vector4. #68098
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix path in servicing doc #68208
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix incorrect results of right shifting huge BigIntegers error reported in Issue #65633 #67867
    area-System.Numerics
  • Cleanup ProjectN references #68201
    area-System.Reflection
  • Fix cmake RPATH CMP0068 warnings #68095
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [AOT] Don't set the 'CorrectedSynthesize' flag in the objc_imageinfo section. #67441
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fixing casing issue with TargetPath #68184
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add links to docs #68211
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Fix very adventurous LIR::Use::GetDummyUse #68131
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • CheckValue is not a fast path for all callers #68125
    area-System.Reflection-mono, community-contribution
  • Updating System.Runtime.InteropServices.NFloat to support generic math #68141
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Improve performance of test partitioning #68172
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Updated

  • Add RL non-generic fixed window, sliding window implementations #68087
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Allow custom attribute filtering with an open generic type. #68158
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Overhaul when/where we check for Regex timeouts #68146
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Remove platform dependent compilation of System.Private.Uri #68011
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Only build the GC simulator tests in the GC simulator leg #68177
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove usage of !! from dotnet/runtime #68178
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() #67917
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Aot annotation on System.Text.Json #67582
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Implement Tar APIs #67883
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fixes incorrect service resolution in Development environment #68053
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Handle more scenarios for loop cloning #67930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Recursive validation #67810
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution
  • Update Microsoft.DotNet.Helix.Sdk #68024
    area-Infrastructure
  • ConfigurationBinder handles ISet<> #68133
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • WIP: Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove GT_ARGPLACE nodes #68140
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Add single-file debugging fix to DBI #67934
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.6
  • Add current-outgoing-connect-attempts counter to Sockets #66651
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.0
  • Retry publish crossgen as AOT (#65948) #67636
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix linux-x86 compilation for clr.alljits subset #68046
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Clean-up `System.Drawing.Common` and remove the Unix code. #64623
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Asynchronous opening of QuicStreams #67859
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix Missing Metadata for ThreadPool Event #67150
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • Enable System.Text.Json tests on netfx (#63803) #67007
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Cleaning up write barrier code #68124
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable UMOD optimization for x64 #68091
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix reading slightly incorrect Zip files #68106
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Handle concurrent reads and concurrent writes on MsQuicStream #67329
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/6.0] Add Fedora 37 RID #65392
    NO-MERGE, area-Host, community-contribution
  • Check MultiCoreJit code cache before trying to jit method in mcj thread #67579
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Change Nullable to default to enable in libraries src and ref projects #68102
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add Ubuntu 22.04 to libraries CI run #67345
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Allow running System.Reflection tests on NativeAOT #67575
    area-System.Reflection
  • Update perf map docs #68181
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • avoid Reflection in Quic #68189
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [iOS] Remove unnecessary newline from CI script #67861
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • More precise writebarrier for regions #67389
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [Android] Enable System.Net.Security tests #68020
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add special Comparer/EqualityComparer for Nullable<Enum> #68077
  • Use 'unsigned short' instead of 'unsigned'. #68190
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on firefox #61776
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] Console.Unix: fix missing terminal configuration on SIGINT/SIGQUIT/SGCONT. #64985
    area-System.Console, 6.0.x
  • Dynamically sized stacks in EventPipe buffer manager #68134
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Arm64: Have CpBlkUnroll and InitBlkUnroll use SIMD registers #68085
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Additional work for x86 support for NativeAOT #68130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Generate the DAC table on Windows with MSVC linker directives instead of resource injection #68065
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use generic math to dedup Enumerable.Min/Max #68183
    area-System.Linq
  • Default interface implementations of static virtual methods - ECMA-335 augments #67619
    documentation
